notes: This pack is a little disappointing, you'd really like to see something more exciting than a good common to start your draft. That being said, the pick is [Separatist Voidmage] edging out [Akroan Sergeant].  It's mostly down to just how powerful of a tempo the [Voidmage] is, and the fact that there are three common red three-drops so you can pretty easily pick up however many you need.
